LanguageData.JRWOviraptorReconstruct.label: Oviraptor
LanguageData.JRWOviraptorReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #038292-1924 [OVIRAPTOR PHILOCERATOPS] CODENAME: KLEPTO >6
A nimble, scrawny theropod that loves shiny things and unwanted debris. If given an inch, they'll even steal the clothes off your back.
LanguageData.JRWOviraptorReconstruct.tools.head.label: head
